comment: Shit RT : BREAKING: Gunshots and several explosions heard at Dammartin-en-Goele site in France: Reuters reporter
amr:
# ::snt Shit RT : BREAKING: Gunshots and several explosions heard at Dammartin-en-Goele site in France: Reuters reporter
(a / and
      :op1 (p / publication
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Shit"
                  :op2 "RT"))
      :op2 (b / break-13
            :ARG1 (r / report-01
                  :ARG0 (p2 / publication
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Reuters"))
                  :ARG1 (h / hear-01
                        :ARG1 (a2 / and
                              :op1 (s / shoot-02
                                    :ARG2 (g / gun))
                              :op2 (e / explode-01
                                    :quant (s2 / several)))
                        :location (s3 / site
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "Dammartin-en-Goele")
                              :location (c / country
                                    :name (n4 / name
                                          :op1 "France")))))))

# ::snt tiros e exploses em dammartin-en-goele
(e / explose-01
      :ARG0 (p / person
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "tiros"))
      :ARG1 (p2 / person
